snippet: The Los Angeles police opened an investigation on Friday into a woman’s claims that Bill Cosby molested her when she was 15 years old, a department spokeswoman said.
abstract: Police in Los Angeles open investigation into Judy Huth's claims that Bill Cosby molested her in 1974 when she was 15 years old; Huth is suing Cosby for sexual battery.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles police opened an investigation on Friday into a woman’s claims that Bill Cosby molested her when she was 15 years old, a department spokeswoman said.

headline.main: California: Inquiry Into Cosby Abuse Claim Opened
headline.print_headline: California: Inquiry Into Cosby Abuse Claim Opened
